v.v: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,
“Go and proclaim in the hearing of Jerusalem. Say, ‘Yahweh says this:
Israel was set apart to Yahweh, the firstfruits of his harvest!
Hear the word of Yahweh, house of Jacob, all you clans of the house of Israel.
Yahweh says this, “What did your fathers find wrong with me, that they went far from following me?
They did not say, ‘Where is Yahweh, who brought us up from the land of Egypt?
But I brought you to the land of Carmel, to eat its fruit and other good things!
The priest did not say, ‘Where is Yahweh?’ and the experts in the law did not care about me!
So I will still accuse you—this is Yahweh’s declaration—and I will accuse your sons’ sons.
For cross over to the coasts of Kittim and look. Send messengers out to Kedar and find out
Has a nation exchanged gods, even though they were not gods?
Shudder, heavens, because of this! Be shocked and horrified—this is Yahweh’s declaration.
For my people have committed two evils against me: They have abandoned the springs of living waters,
Is Israel a slave? Was he born in his master’s home? So why has he become plunder?
Young lions roared against him. They made a lot of noise and made his land a horror.
Also, the people of Memphis and Tahpanhes will shave your skull.
Did you not do this to yourselves
So now, why take the road to Egypt and drink the waters of Shihor?
Your wickedness rebukes you, and your faithlessness punishes you. So think about it and understand that it is wicked and bitter
For I broke your yoke that you had in ancient days; I tore your fetters off you. Still you said,
I planted you as a choice vine, completely from pure seed.
For even if you clean yourself in the river or wash with strong soap,
How can you say, ‘I am not defiled! I have not walked after the Baals’?
a wild donkey accustomed to the wilderness, in her heat sniffing the wind!
You must restrain your feet from becoming bare and your throat from being thirsty!
Like the shame of a thief when he is found, so the house of Israel will be ashamed—
These are the ones who say to the tree, ‘You are my father,’ and to the stone, ‘You gave birth to me.’
Yet where are the gods that you made for yourselves? Let them arise if they wish to save you in your time of troubles,
So why do you accuse me of doing wrong? All of you have sinned against me—this is Yahweh’s declaration.
I have punished your people in vain. They would not accept discipline.
You who belong to this generation! Pay attention to my word, the word of Yahweh! Have I been a wilderness to Israel?
Will a virgin forget her jewelry, a bride her veils?
How well you make your way to look for love.
The blood that was the life of innocent, poor people has been found on your clothes.
Yet you say, ‘I am innocent; surely his anger has turned away from me.’
Why do you treat so very lightly this change in your ways?
You will also go out from there dejected, with your hands on your head,
“If a man divorces his wife and she goes from him and becomes another man’s wife,
Lift up your eyes to the barren heights and look! Is there any place where you have not had illicit sex?
So the showers have been withheld and the spring rains have not come;
Have you not just now called to me: ‘My father! My closest friend even from my youth!
Will he always be angry? Will he always keep his wrath to the end?’

v: I have called to mind on your behalf the covenant faithfulness in your youthfulness, your love at the time when we were engaged,
when you went after me in the wilderness, the land that was not sown.
All who ate from the firstfruits were held guilty; disaster came upon them—this is Yahweh’s declaration.’”
That they went after useless idols and became useless themselves?
Where is Yahweh, who led us to the wilderness, into the land of the Arabah and pits,
in a land of drought and deep darkness,
a land through which no one passes and where no one lives?’
Yet when you came, you defiled my land, you made my inheritance an abomination!
The shepherds transgressed against me. The prophets prophesied for Baal and walked after unprofitable things.
and see if there has ever before been anything like this.
But my people have exchanged their glory for what cannot help them.
and they have dug out cisterns for themselves,
broken cisterns that cannot hold water.
His cities are destroyed without any inhabitants.
when you abandoned Yahweh your God, while he was leading you along the way?
Why take the road to Assyria and drink the waters of the Euphrates River?
when you forsake Yahweh your God, and have no fear of me—this is the declaration of Lord Yahweh of hosts.
‘I will not serve!’ since you bowed down on every high hill and beneath every leafy tree, you adulterer.
How then have you have changed yourself into a corrupt, worthless vine?
your iniquity is a stain before me—this is the declaration of the Lord Yahweh.
Look at what you did in the valleys! Consider what you have done—you are a swift female camel running here and there,
Who can restrain her lust? None of the males need wear themselves out pursuing her; at mating time they will find her.
But you have said, ‘It is hopeless! No, I love strangers and go after them!’
they, their kings, their princes, and their priests and prophets!
For their back faces me and not their faces. Nevertheless, they say in the time of troubles, ‘Arise and save us!’
for your idols equal your cities in number, Judah!
Your sword has devoured your prophets like a destructive lion!
Or a land of deep darkness? Why would my people say, ‘Let us wander around, we will not go to you anymore’?
Yet my people have forgotten me for days without number!
You have even taught your ways to wicked women.
These people were not discovered in acts of burglary.
But look! I will bring down judgment on you because you say, ‘I have not sinned.’
You will also be disappointed by Egypt, just as you were by Assyria.
for Yahweh has rejected the ones whom you trusted, so you will not be helped by them.”
